website_summaries.verdict: For women who prefer a smaller bag, this smart-looking classic is ideal for carrying a few important items, and it has numerous pockets for its size.
pros: Sports a streamlined design with pockets for organizing credit cards and phone
Long strap and chain can be carried cross body
cons: Pricey, considering how small it is
Some phones barley fit in it
A few reports of consumers receiving the wrong color

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable and just barely 6S+ friendly
customer_reviews.text: I have an iPhone 6S+ and I read mixed reviews about whether or not it would fit in this purse. Well make no mistake it is quite a tight squeeze. I have a standard size case (not an otterbox or life proof, just a sleeve) and I have to somewhat force it in the purse. It will not shut with much else in the purse. The photos are shown with the purse closed and the iPhone plus some gum and lipstick inside. I love MKs because you know you're getting long lasting quality. The design on this purse is very well done and the minimalist will appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally J

customer_reviews.title: A Great Birthday Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my college-age granddaughter, and she lives it. The space for her cell phone is perfect (she doesn't have one of the huge phones) and she uses it even more the she thought she would. We were a bit worried about the paper money space because she frequently has a stack of $1 bills when she finishes work. It has proved up to the task! The cross body strap is a good length, and it's a classy, well-made little purse.
customer_reviews.author: NaNaT

customer_reviews.title: I just knew I was going to love this wallet/purse
customer_reviews.text: I just knew I was going to love this wallet/purse, and I do. The color and texture is perfect, the strap is great. The only thing I am concerned about is that it's a little difficult to fasten the snap in the front. Wish it was a magnet closing. Otherwise, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Small and Perfect for Going Out
customer_reviews.text: Small and really cute crossbody. Perfect for going out if you don't need a lot. For me, it's usually my license, credit cards, cash, lipstick, eyedrops, keys. This will not fit chunky keys/keychain. And your credit cards actually fit in the card pockets - so many purses make this surprisingly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Favorite go-to cross body bag I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Favorite go-to cross body bag I've ever had. It matches everything & it's the perfect size. I can fit all my license/debit/credit cards, cash, business cards & lip gloss inside. I usually put my iPhone in the outside pocket for easy access. Only thing it doesn't fit are my key ring unless I take everything off & just use the single key. LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real deal Michael Kors.
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal at a great price! She uses it all the time when we go out. Has a nifty little phone pocket on the inside (6 plus doesn't fit, but fits into the main compartment).
customer_reviews.author: Brenton McClure

customer_reviews.title: VERY SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Size is very small - barely can get keys, phone, and lipstick in it. The word "Large" in the headline is misleading. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Testarossa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Love this item, but it is a smaller cross body, i can fit my cell phone and cards, but also trying to fit my big key fob etc makes it a bit tough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves the little bag. Great Anniversary present. Shipped fast. Well packed. Came with authentic papers from Michael kors
customer_reviews.author: The Smiths

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for ID and lipstick
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as Mother's Day gift for my mom since she always carries her big bag everywhere it's so cute and perfect for credit card and lipstick and car key good quality we bought the brown because my mom loves neutral colors but I personally would get the brighter colors but my mom loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy though.
customer_reviews.text: Cute & Classy looking, can't put too much in it, does fit my cell phone, It's sturdy though.
customer_reviews.author: luv leopard

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture shown
customer_reviews.text: Not like the picture shown, the seller originally had the medium Jet setter and this is not that purse. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: manda Winchester

customer_reviews.title: Classy Michael Kors product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this one. Great quality and a great deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel J White

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 17 year old sister - she needed a small cute and sensible purse. This price was cheaper than Macy's, Dillards and TJMaxx. The gold chain can turn any casual outfit more dressy. Would buy one for myself if hadn't given it to my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Like it so much
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag very much. Didn't wear yet but it fits so many of my evening dresses, also good with casual looks. My smallest bag :) also my 1st MK bag. Like the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect, I have the small one too for evenings ...
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect, I have the small one too for evenings out. The large one is big enough for day use. Great quality too!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Peters

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong here!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and in great packaging. She loved it!! Once it was opened the compliments kept coming. Very nice quality purse. It really looks and feels great.
customer_reviews.author: JayCei Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's basically a large wallet with room ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It's basically a large wallet with room for a large cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The purse is nice but I ordered a black and received a brown, very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Trini Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Brought this product for a quick trip out of town to be lighter.. Excellent for that and feels great not to over stuff my purse/bag
customer_reviews.author: MRS. HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size... it is my go to purse when going out like to the club/ bar
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: Love it and very roomy
customer_reviews.text: Love it and very roomy. Carry it when you don't need a lot of items in your purse. Very fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D

customer_reviews.title: Date night
customer_reviews.text: I love this purse. Fits a iPhone 6s with a pop socket, a lipstick, and a few cards and some cash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Love it. My iphone 6plus (in a case) fits inside.
customer_reviews.author: cher4sc

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: great cross body! But only if u have a thin phone
customer_reviews.author: S. Sprinkle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, she loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my dauhters trip to Italy! Perfect, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D.

customer_reviews.title: It's a wonderful product, but I ordered black and got navy ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful product, but I ordered black and got navy blue. Great size, great for every day, dressy, or vacation wear.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick A Karimian

customer_reviews.title: Great purse
customer_reviews.text: This purse is exactly as described. My granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Just the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife as a gift, she gets so many compliments on how nice her bag is. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: George Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this purchase! I hate digging around in a big purse so this is perfect. Along with the 6 spaces it provides for cards, I also have plenty of room to carry my IPhone 7 Plus, a checkbook & pen, cash, receipts, coins & more.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag, but difficult to carry much more than a couple cards and a phone. My set of keys doesn't fit unless I take off just the few I need.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Bear

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits iPhone and Samsung 7 Edge! Great for travel and Vegas! Great amenities inside.
customer_reviews.author: KR in SV

customer_reviews.title: Micheal Kors!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The love this little purse. This was my fav for a while.
customer_reviews.author: angela c.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small black going out bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect small black going out bag. Fits iPhone 6 and a few credit cards, lip gloss, etc. Perfect for going out!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday gift. Meet the description exactly, came on time with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel/Evening Bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect travel bag. Fits cellphone, credit cards, DL and cash. Goes well with jeans, casual or dress for evening attire.
customer_reviews.author: krankin

customer_reviews.title: Compact easy to take with you
customer_reviews.text: It's a dream everyday look as well as going out. Compact easy to take with you. Awesome overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and a lot of room for a crossbag , love it
customer_reviews.author: Shaun M.

customer_reviews.title: Trendy
customer_reviews.text: Super trendy and elegant all in one. Excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is the perfect size for her and holds just what she needs
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for daughter and she loves it, it is the perfect size for her and holds just what she needs.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M. Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent present
customer_reviews.text: Very goodbye product. It was for a present and served ideally for that!
customer_reviews.author: Mark J

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Loved loved the bag it was just to small for all the things I needed to put in it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purse is just a lil small but overall a goof purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rulkatron Name

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart within a month
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful purse, nice size. However, was hugely disappoint with it. The clasp broke within a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was beautiful, came promptly
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Mother's Day gift for my daughter-in-law, who wanted a bag that would carry her cell phone and a few other necessities, allow her to go "hands-free" and yet be stylish. This filled all those requirements, was beautiful, came promptly, and was a lot less expensive that the same item at my local department store. So both the giver and the recipient were very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The purse was excellent quality however it was too small for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing. The quality is great and it is the ...
customer_reviews.text: It is amazing. The quality is great and it is the real deal. More spacious then I thought. I am 100% satisfied with the purse
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came super early and I love it! It's so cute
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good size, fits large phones (Samsung Note), but is snug Cons: stiff leather, logo fell off This is a great bag that I recommend if you want a bag that doesn't bend. The stiff leather would be a benefit to those who want better protection for their phone. The logo falling off was probably just a fluke, I've had other Michael Kors bags that didn't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: It too small to me
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it small to me that why
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love it!  The product was received on time and was exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! The product was received on time and was exactly as described!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Huber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it’s a btful handbag but it’s too small... it looks like a tiny wallet hanging from a long chain. For the money I could have gotten sth as nice but way bigger. It took no time to arrive though.
customer_reviews.author: Carlosagv

customer_reviews.title: I love this! It's exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It's exactly what I was looking for. I have an iPhone 6 (no case) and I can easily fit it in. I also can keep Chapstick, a pack of gum, cards, cash and tampons in it all at once. It's tight but that's what I wanted, something small and compact and this is exactly that! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Item shipped is not the same as item pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag and what I received was not the item pictured. The item received was a MK bag but larger and had a zipper top instead of the snap flap pictured. I originally thought I had ordered the wrong bag, so I reordered and received the wrong bag a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Garlock

customer_reviews.title: 1st mk bag and loving it
customer_reviews.text: Everything looks good. Except that the one I received has 6 card slots (3 side by side). I'm not complaining, cause I actually like the side by side over the single 5 slots in the middle- which was what it was shown on Michael kors site. I also noticed that zappos also shown the picture of 6 card slots instead of 5. And this does question if what I paid for is authentic or not. Or maybe it's just a different model. But overall, I'm happy with the bag atm.
customer_reviews.author: see

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purse for my daughter in college! She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian A.

product_meta.title: MICHAEL Michael Kors Women's Jet Set Large Phone Cross Body Bag
product_meta.description:
A petite MICHAEL Michael Kors cross-body bag in saffiano leather. Polished logo lettering accents the top flap. Leather-lined interior with 5 card slots, a zip pocket, and a middle compartment. Optional, adjustable shoulder strap.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :9.41 x 7.91 x 1.93 inches; 15.24 Ounces
 * Department :Womens
 * Date First Available :April 2, 2018
 * ASIN :B07BWB629Q

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #819,948 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #2910 inWomen's Crossbody Handbags 
    *  #369547 inWomen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars158 ratings A petite MICHAEL Michael Kors cross-body bag in saffiano leather. Polished logo lettering accents the top flap. Leather-lined interior with 5 card slots, a zip pocket, and a middle compartment. Optional, adjustable shoulder strap.
feature_bullets: Interior: One Cell Phone Pocket, Five Card Holders, One Zip Pocket
